description: A merge clause is trying to update rows that do not exist yet. Fix the WHEN NOT MATCHED branch so new source records are inserted.
starterCode: WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET target.status = source.status
simulatedOutput: Issue: New records are not being inserted into target table.
hints: NOT MATCHED rows should create new records.
Use INSERT for unmatched source rows.
Keep this change in the NOT MATCHED branch.
